name: Avoid using attachEvent (Javascript)
description: This rule will check the use of attachEvent API in you javascript code.
output:
Associated to each violation, the following information is provided:
- The number of violation occurrences
- Bookmarks for violation occurrences found in the source code
rationale: attachEvent is IE-only and not supported elsewhere.
remediation: Use addEventListener with appropriate feature detection (if you must support very old browsers, add a small wrapper).
